unnormalised: Hey folks, solar rooftop subsidies are a game changer! My cousin, Priya in Chennai, got a sweet deal. Rs. 50,000 off! Now she's powering her AC and watching IPL guilt-free. Heard the UP govt is also giving big discounts. Plus, less pollution is like celebrating a silent Diwali every day! Maybe I should also look into this before Onam. Everyone's house is powered by the sun!
